mapper.select: SELECT SUM(LDRTOAGV) as LDRTOAGVALL FROM "AGV_EXCHANGE_COST_COUNT" where WORKSTATION = 'PK-KT' and LOADER = #{loader} and CYCLE_TYPE = 'DAY' and to_char(STARTTIME,'hh24:mi:ss') BETWEEN '08:30:00' and '09:30:00' and to_char(ENDTIME,'hh24:mi:ss') BETWEEN '08:30:00' and '09:30:00' and to_char(STARTTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(ENDTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(STARTTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(trunc(SYSDATE),'yyyy-mm-dd')

SELECT SUM(LDRTOAGV) as LDRTOAGVALL FROM "AGV_EXCHANGE_COST_COUNT" where WORKSTATION = 'PK-KT' and LOADER = #{loader} and CYCLE_TYPE = 'DAY' and to_char(STARTTIME,'hh24:mi:ss') BETWEEN '09:30:00' and '10:30:00' and to_char(ENDTIME,'hh24:mi:ss') BETWEEN '09:30:00' and '10:30:00' and to_char(STARTTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(ENDTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(STARTTIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(trunc(SYSDATE),'yyyy-mm-dd')
